job_details.Vacaturetitel: AI/ML Engineer Specializing in Large Language Models (Llms)
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
XABLU is seeking a Medior/Senior AI Developer with expertise in a wide range of AI technologies, including Large Language Models (LLMs). We are at the forefront of providing AI-driven solutions with practical utility for business. We are seeking a highly skilled AI Developer to join our dynamic team. This role is crucial in developing and integrating AI technologies across multiple products. Responsibilities include developing, testing, and maintaining AI solutions, ensuring code quality, and working on innovative AI applications like chatbots and advanced data analysis tools. Strong communication and teamwork are essential. XABLU offers a diverse, collaborative work environment with ample opportunities for personal and professional growth.
       What is the position?
       We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated AI/ML Engineer with a passion for developing and working with Large Language Models (LLMs). The ideal candidate will be responsible for testing and integrating various open-source models into our wide range of products, ensuring that our solutions are not only innovative but also robust and user-friendly.
       What are you going to do?
       Key Responsibilities
          + Develop, test, and maintain Large Language Models for various applications.
          + Evaluate and integrate open-source AI/ML models into our product suite
          + Work closely with the product development team to implement AI features in our contract drafting tool, chatbot, and other products.
          + Stay abreast of the latest developments in AI/ML technologies, particularly in the realm of LLMs
          + Collaborate with the data science team to improve model performance and accuracy
          + Provide technical leadership and mentorship to junior team members (interns)
          + Document and present research findings and development processes
       Join us in our journey to redefine the boundaries of AI and ML, and help us create smarter solutions for a smarter world!
       You will be part of an ambitious and growing organization that aims to create the best training and consultancy services for cross-platform mobile app development. You'll work on several different projects and integrate the most relevant solutions.
       Who are we looking for?, XABLU is a leader in cross-platform mobile app development and consultancy. From boosting our clients' development teams to helping them refine their mobile strategy: we are there to support them with all of their app development needs. In addition, we host events where developers can talk about technology, hack and socialize. We are known for our deep expertise in the Microsoft Xamarin (.NET Maui) mobile ecosystem as well as our signature friendly and efficient team approach.
       We also have internal projects we are developing: one is a user-centered platform combined with blockchain, and the other is a platform with a lot of automation challenges! We are continuously integrating AI/ML tooling in the products we develop.
       Within XABLU, team and communication is our top priority and we embrace different cultures as well as different geo-locations. At XABLU, you'll be working in an environment where you can express your talents, ideas and personality. You'll be pushed by your colleagues to develop yourself and the team in an informal and fun atmosphere.
       Your Profile
job_details.full_text:
AI/ML Engineer Specializing in Large Language Models (Llms)

XABLU is seeking a Medior/Senior AI Developer with expertise in a wide range of AI technologies, including Large Language Models (LLMs). We are at the forefront of providing AI-driven solutions with practical utility for business. We are seeking a highly skilled AI Developer to join our dynamic team. This role is crucial in developing and integrating AI technologies across multiple products. Responsibilities include developing, testing, and maintaining AI solutions, ensuring code quality, and working on innovative AI applications like chatbots and advanced data analysis tools. Strong communication and teamwork are essential. XABLU offers a diverse, collaborative work environment with ample opportunities for personal and professional growth.
       What is the position?
       We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated AI/ML Engineer with a passion for developing and working with Large Language Models (LLMs). The ideal candidate will be responsible for testing and integrating various open-source models into our wide range of products, ensuring that our solutions are not only innovative but also robust and user-friendly.
       What are you going to do?
       Key Responsibilities
          + Develop, test, and maintain Large Language Models for various applications.
          + Evaluate and integrate open-source AI/ML models into our product suite
          + Work closely with the product development team to implement AI features in our contract drafting tool, chatbot, and other products.
          + Stay abreast of the latest developments in AI/ML technologies, particularly in the realm of LLMs
          + Collaborate with the data science team to improve model performance and accuracy
          + Provide technical leadership and mentorship to junior team members (interns)
          + Document and present research findings and development processes
       Join us in our journey to redefine the boundaries of AI and ML, and help us create smarter solutions for a smarter world!
       You will be part of an ambitious and growing organization that aims to create the best training and consultancy services for cross-platform mobile app development. You'll work on several different projects and integrate the most relevant solutions.
       Who are we looking for?, XABLU is a leader in cross-platform mobile app development and consultancy. From boosting our clients' development teams to helping them refine their mobile strategy: we are there to support them with all of their app development needs. In addition, we host events where developers can talk about technology, hack and socialize. We are known for our deep expertise in the Microsoft Xamarin (.NET Maui) mobile ecosystem as well as our signature friendly and efficient team approach.
       We also have internal projects we are developing: one is a user-centered platform combined with blockchain, and the other is a platform with a lot of automation challenges! We are continuously integrating AI/ML tooling in the products we develop.
       Within XABLU, team and communication is our top priority and we embrace different cultures as well as different geo-locations. At XABLU, you'll be working in an environment where you can express your talents, ideas and personality. You'll be pushed by your colleagues to develop yourself and the team in an informal and fun atmosphere.
       Your Profile

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes working with Large Language Models (LLMs), including developing, testing, integrating, and fine-tuning them. It mentions building AI applications like chatbots and contract drafting tools, which are core to the GenAI Engineer profile. The technologies and responsibilities align with building user-facing applications powered by generative AI.
